name: HorrorFantasy
description:
A horror fantasy embedding which i made when i wanted to expand the horror aspect from my dark fantasy embedding. This embedding leans more towards the horror theme/body horror style.

There is no trigger word

My images lose their metadata when i upscale them, so i have to manually add the prompts to the pictures, that is why there are no CFG scales or seeds shown in the example images.

All example images made with my DarkRevPikas model.

Recommendations:

Using CFG scale: 6-8

Steps: 30-37

prompt:

horror \(theme\), body horror, demon girl, monster girl, dark, gothic, glowing, colored skin,

(A lot of the pictures had purple glow in them, so if you want a specific color just change the "glowing" to a color like "red glowing" or "blue glowing" etc..)

Some images had watermarks which i couldn't remove so using these tags in the negative might help:

watermark, username, signature, patreon username, patreon logo,

VAE:

kl-f8-anime2: https://huggingface.co/hakurei/waifu-diffusion-v1-4/blob/main/vae/kl-f8-anime2.ckpt

or

vae-ft-mse: https://huggingface.co/stabilityai/sd-vae-ft-mse-original/blob/main/vae-ft-mse-840000-ema-pruned.ckpt
